name: Water Color Sort Pro
description:
The game is easy to get used to, but it is difficult to become an expert and there are over 500 puzzles from Easy to Expert difficulty game modes to challenge you.
- train your brain with this relaxing game!

★ HOW TO PLAY
- Touch any glass bottle to pour water into another bottle.
The one simple rule is that you can only pour water into another bottle if it is linked to the same color and there is enough space on the glass bottle.
- Do your best and don't get stuck. You can always start over at any time.
